bib.title: Managing degraded forests, a new priority in the Brazilian Amazon
bib.author: Lilian Blanc and Joice Ferreira and Marie-Gabrielle Piketty and Clément Bourgoin and Valéry Gond and Bruno Hérault and Milton Kanashiro and François Laurent and Marc Piraux and Ervan Rutishauser and Plinio Sist
bib.abstract: June 201740 level. Preventing forest degradation implies devising specific measures to monitor and promote these forests and to control activities conducted in them. Modelled on what has been done to curb deforestation since 2005, a second stage should be launched, involving the prevention and control of forest degradation.
